Villagers attempt to put out a wildfire, in #Achallam village, in the mountainous #Kabylie region of Tizi Ouzou, east of the #Algerian capital. 
#Wildfires are raging through forested areas of the country's north and have killed at least 65 people, state television reported. https://t.co/zQ3orLUPFH
